settings.title: Hemi 15: Our Scientific <br class="hide-desktop"> Secret to <br class="hide-mobile"> Healthy, <br class="hide-desktop"> Juicy Curls
settings.text: The product of countless hours in our lab with 4U's team of clean chemists. Hemi15 is our award-winning, hero ingredient that addresses the unique needs of curly hair by locking in more moisture than ever before.

settings.heading: Waves, Curls, Coils: We’ve Got You Covered
About Waves
settings.content: Waves, loops, ‘s’ curls. Don’t let anything weigh down your waves. Clarifying shampoos that keep your hair and scalp free of buildup without stripping moisture as well as styling products to help hold shape are our favorites for this versatile hair type.

settings.heading: About Curls
settings.content: Springs, spirals, corkscrews. Curls span everything from loose, soft waves to tightly packed volume. Go for leave-in treatments that hydrate and lock in moisture without weighing down strands, and products that minimize unwanted frizz while bringing out your natural bounce.

settings.heading: About Coils
settings.content: Zig-zags, coils, tight rings. Coils lend themselves to a range of styles and are vulnerable to breakage—especially when wet—so aim for deeply hydrating conditioners as well as creams and oils that help retain moisture, resist tangles, and increase definition.
